data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I want to make a few modules that will assist in network
    troubleshooting and testing as well as some other small tasks, such
    as speed testing, link reliability, jitter detection, TTL exceeded,
    etc. I feel such things will be of great help to many people,
    especially if they want to see if a host is too far away to talk to,
    etc.
